definition: to praise/to compliment
to fit/balanced/suitable
to weigh/to state/to name/name/appellation/to praise
variant of 秤[cheng4]/steelyard
abbr. for 揚州|扬州[Yang2 zhou1]/surname Yang
to raise/to hoist/the action of tossing or winnowing/scattering (in the wind)/to flutter/to propagate

sentences.english: But those whom Christ commends know not that they have been ministering unto Him.
sentences.chinese: 但是基督所稱揚的那些人並不知道自己曾經幫助過他。

sentences.english: The First Edition was widely praised for its readability, and that emphasis is retained.
sentences.chinese: 初版廣泛因它的易讀性而被稱揚，並且重點被保留。

sentences.english: The report has yet to be confirmed, though rumors that Young has passed a physical for United have also surfaced.
sentences.chinese: 交易尚待確認，儘管有傳言稱揚已經去曼聯體檢了。

sentences.english: And he taught in their synagogues, and was magnified by all.
sentences.chinese: 他在他們的會堂內施教，受到衆人的稱揚。

sentences.english: The holy Church throughout all the world doth acknowledge thee;
sentences.chinese: 全球各地的神聖教會，一起稱揚你。

sentences.english: I will lift up the cup of salvation and call on the name of the Lord .
sentences.chinese: 我要舉起救恩的杯，稱揚耶和華的名。

sentences.english: Widows and orphans were exalting the name of Jesus for His works of mercy to them.
sentences.chinese: 孤兒寡婦因耶穌向他們所施的仁慈而稱揚他的名。

sentences.english: The soldier's brave deeds brought him honor and glory.
sentences.chinese: 兵士的英勇事蹟爲他帶來了榮耀和稱揚。

sentences.english: All the powers of the Lord, bless the Lord, praise and exalt him for ever.
sentences.chinese: 上主的軍旅，請讚美上主，歌頌稱揚他，直到永遠。

sentences.english: I will take the cup of salvation, and call upon the name of the LORD.
sentences.chinese: 我要舉起救恩的杯，稱揚耶和華的名。

sentences.english: Early Han Dynasty, called for Guangling County Yangzhou.

definition: see 呂洞賓|吕洞宾[Lu:3 Dong4 bin1]
Liuying township in Tainan county 台南縣|台南县[Tai2 nan2 xian4], Taiwan
Zou Yan (305-240 BC), founder of the School of Yin-Yang of the Warring States Period (475-221 BC)
to pass on the light of Buddha
the five impurities (Buddhism)
famous person
at one's ease/carefree
Baopuzi, collection of essays by Ge Hong 葛洪[Ge3 Hong2] on alchemy, immortality, legalism, society etc
mulberry farming/to grow mulberry for sericulture
to know how to count and do sums/numerate/numeracy
lit. divine pen/fig. outstanding writing
to transmit Buddhist teaching/chakram or chakka (throwing disk)
Nagarjuna (Nagarjuna Bodhisattva)
bridal room and ornamented candles/wedding festivities (idiom)
to rely on/to base oneself on
feast/celebration
